name: Bodacious Potpourri
description:
Survive the attack waves of thriller and billie jean.

This game was made for the Beginners Circle Jam hosted by AngrySmile.

Made from scratch within the time frame.

Everything made with Open Source Software:

Graphics/Animation: Aseprite

SoundFX: Audacity

Music: LMMS

Engine: GDevelop

Originally i wanted to make a brawler type game (double dragon inspired) with different enemies and dance moves as attacks.. but i realized i needed at least 6 months to make what i had in visioned and i only had 10 days for the jam so.. here is bodacious potpourri :D so what did i learn with this? scope low for your project, then scope lower xD

Please Support Open Source!
